ai-patthana8.20:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.20:1.1_0: Not for the sake of thought, not for the sake of speech.
ai-patthana8.20:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the teaching that doesn’t give rise to many people.
ai-patthana8.20:1.1_2: There are no cause or reason for speaking. The thought doesn’t give rise to the thought for settling. But those things don’t arise because of that.
ai-patthana8.20:2.1_0: There is no cause or reason for speaking on the teaching, not for the sake of another.
ai-patthana8.20:2.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the teaching, nor for those who don’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana8.20:2.1_2: Not for the sake of another, but not for the sake of fetters. ...
ai-patthana8.20:3.1_0: Not for the sake of another, nor for the sake of wisdom, but not for the sake of another.
ai-patthana8.20:3.1_1: Not for the sake of another, nor for the sake of wisdom.
ai-patthana8.20:3.1_2: Not for the sake of Kings don’t give rise to the thought, nor do those things arise for the sake of speaking, but not for the sake of another.
ai-patthana8.20:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
